TestCaseMetaData.name: Lipid Panel Header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. These test plan are designed to test the system's capability to process reports containing fasting status information and handle receipt of duplicate messages.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to import and incorporate a message that contains fasting status information and demonstrate the proper handling of receipt of duplicate reports.
